Running MQTT Broker as a Docker Container Using Docker Compose

frontMatter.title: How I Setup MQTT Broker Docker Container Or Addon In Home Assistant — Step-By-Step Guide

frontMatter.summary: In this article, we will be looking at how we configure Frigate to detect object and then connect it to Home Assistant to receive notification.
